Class-Monk 20 -- Male Skilled Human Monk: 20
Strength: +4 Dexterity: +5 Constitution: +4 Intelligence: +3 Wisdom: +4 Charisma: +3
Background: Herbalist Deity: Gozreh
Experience: 19078/20000 Level: 20 Speed: 60 Size: Medium Encumbered/Maximum Bulk: 9/14
Attribute Notes:
Attribute Boosts: Attribute Boost (Choose 20 from any)
Fleet: +5 Speed
Incredible Movement: +30 Speed in no armor
Wall Run: (1) Strides on vertical surfaces
Water Step: Can Stride across liquids, but must end on a solid surface to avoid sinking
Features/Skills

Monk Key Attribute: 1 selection
Path To Perfection: 2 selections
Qi Tradition: 1 selection
Second Path To Perfection: +1 selection
Skill Feats: Skill Feats (Choose 10 from any)
Third Path To Perfection: 1 selection
Peerless Form: Does not age
Perception: +28 (wisdom; expert)
Skill Modifiers:
Academia Lore: +25 (intelligence; trained) Farming Lore: +25 (intelligence; trained) Performance: +3 (charisma; untrained)
Acrobatics: +31 (dexterity; master) Hellknights Lore: +25 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +4 (wisdom; untrained)
Arcana: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Herbalism Lore: +25 (intelligence; trained) Sailing Lore: +25 (intelligence; trained)
Art Lore: +31 (intelligence; legendary) Hobgoblin Lore: +25 (intelligence; trained) Scribing Lore: +25 (intelligence; trained)
Astrology Lore: +25 (intelligence; trained) Intimidation: +3 (charisma; untrained) Society: +3 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +30 (strength; master) Medicine: +4 (wisdom; untrained) Stealth: +5 (dexterity; untrained)
Crafting: +3 (intelligence; untrained) Mountain Lore: +31 (intelligence; legendary) Survival: +4 (wisdom; untrained)
Deception: +27 (charisma; expert) Nature: +28 (wisdom; expert) Swamp Lore: +27 (intelligence; expert)
Diplomacy: +3 (charisma; untrained) Occultism: +25 (intelligence; trained) Thievery: +27 (dexterity; trained)
Languages: Aklo; Common; Gnomish; Halfling; Kholo
Skill Notes:
Additional Lore (Art Lore): Skill Legendary (Art Lore)
Additional Lore (Mountain Lore): Skill Legendary (Mountain Lore)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3 Language Count
Monk Skills: Skill Trained (Choose 7 from any)
Perception Expertise: Perception Expert
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 9 from any)
Skill Training (Farming Lore): Skill Trained (Farming Lore)
Skill Training (Hellknights Lore): Skill Trained (Hellknights Lore)
Skilled Human: Skill Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Assurance (Art Lore): Can take an automatic 38 on Art Lore checks
Assurance (Nature): Can take an automatic 34 on Nature checks
Automatic Knowledge (Art Lore): Can use Assurance (Art Lore) to Recall Knowledge as a free action once per rd
Crane Stance: (1) Unarmored stance gives -5 jump DC and +2' and +5' vertical and horizontal Leaps
Dancing Leaf: +5' Jump and Leap distance
Dubious Knowledge: Failure on a Recall Knowledge check yields a mix of true and false information
Experienced Professional: Critical failures when using Lore to Earn Income are normal failures, and normal failures give twice the normal income
Express Rider: Successful Nature increases the speed of self and 6 allies' mounts by half for a day
Incredible Improvisation: (F) Gains +4 on an untrained skill check once per day
Legendary Professional: Improves NPCs' attitude by 1 step for those with ranks in Society/Increases the job level when Earning Income using Lore
Natural Medicine: Can use Nature to Treat Wounds; gives a +2 bonus in wilderness
Train Animal: Can use days of training and a successful Nature check to teach an animal to perform a trick
Unmistakable Lore: Critical failures to Recall Knowledge on a trained Lore are normal failures and critical successes on a Lore with master proficiency provide additional information
Combat
Hit Points: 288 Armor Class: 43 (dexterity; legendary) Class DC: Monk: 41 (dexterity; master)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Cobra Fang (+31 1d4+4 P [Crit +d10]; dexterity; master); Crane Wing (+31 1d6+4 B; dexterity; master); Dragon Tail (+30 1d10+4 B; strength; master); Falling Stone (+30 1d8+4 B; strength; master); Fist (+31 1d6+4 B; dexterity; master); Iron Sweep (+30 1d8+4 B; strength; master); Javelin (+31 1d6+4 P R30'; dexterity; master); Lashing Branch (+31 1d8+4 S; dexterity; master); Morningstar (+30 1d6+4 B/P; strength; master); Staff (+30 1d4+4 B [2h d8]; strength; master); Stumbling Swing (+31 1d8+4 B; dexterity; master); Tiger Claw (+31 1d8+4 S [Crit +1d4 persistent bleed]; dexterity; master); Wind Crash (+30 1d6+2 B R30'; strength; master); Wolf Jaw (+31 1d8+4 P; dexterity; master)
Combat Notes:
Advanced Monastic Weaponry: Weapon Familiarity (Advanced Monk Weapons)
Cobra Envenom: Has increased Cobra Stance effects
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +5
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +5
Expert Strikes: Attack Expert (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Graceful Legend: Defense Legendary (Unarmored Defense)/Class Master (Monk)
Graceful Mastery: Defense Master (Unarmored Defense)
Greater Weapon Specialization: Has increased Weapon Specialization effects
Master Strikes: Attack Master (Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Monastic Archer Stance: (1) Attack Master (Longbow; Shortbow; Monk Bows)
Monastic Weaponry: Attack Master (Monk Weapons)
Monk Expertise: Class Expert (Monk)
Powerful Fist: Fists inflict 1d6 HP damage
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Unconventional Weaponry (Sawtooth Saber): Weapon Familiarity (Sawtooth Saber)
Weapon Proficiency (Flying Talon): Attack Expert (Flying Talon)
Adamantine Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as adamantine weapons
Cobra Envenom: (1) Cobra fang Strike gains +5' reach and inflicts +1d4 HP persistent poison once per min
Cobra Stance: (1) Stance allows only cobra fang attacks
Crane Flutter: (R) Crane Stance gives +3 Armor Class vs. the triggering melee Strike, and a miss allows an immediate -2 crane wing Strike
Crane Stance: (1) Unarmored stance gives +1 Armor Class and restricts Strikes to crane wing attacks
Crushing Grab: Can inflict 4 HP bludgeoning, lethal or nonlethal, with a successful Grapple
Deflect Projectile: (R) Gives +4 Armor Class vs. a physical ranged attack
Diamond Fists: Unarmed Strikes gain the forceful and deadly d10 traits or increase damage by 1 die step
Disrupt Qi: (2) Successful unarmed Strike also inflicts 3d6 HP persistent void and enfeebled 1 while the persistent damage continues
Dodging Roll: (R) Step when in an area affected by area damage gives resistance 20 to the triggering damage, or resistance 25 if the Step exits the area
Dragon Roar: (1) R15' Bellow while in Dragon Stance inflicts frightened 1 on foes once per 1d4 rd, and affected adjacent foes cannot reduce their frightened value below 1 (save Will vs. Intimidation negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 2); the first successful Strike before the end of the next turn on a frightened foe inflicts +4 HP
Dragon Stance: (1) Unarmored stance allows dragon tail attacks and Strides that ignore the first square of difficult terrain
Enduring Quickness: Permanently quickened; can use the additional action to Stride, Leap, or Jump
Expert Strikes: Critical hits with a brawling unarmed attack inflict its critical specialization effect
Flurry Of Blows: (1) Makes 2 unarmed Strikes once per turn
Flurry Of Maneuvers: Can use Flurry Of Blows to Grapple, Reposition, Shove, or Trip
Flying Kick: (2) Makes a Strike at the end of a Leap or Jump
Focused Shot: (1) Ranged weapon Strike within its first range increment ignores cover and concealment
Form Lock: (1) Successful Athletics check counteracts a polymorph effect affecting a grabbed or restrained foe once per target per day
Fuse Stance: Has merged 2 known stances into a unique new stance that grants the effects of both
Godbreaker: (3) Successful unarmed Strike after throwing a grappled foe upward 20' also inflicts falling damage and allows repeating twice; hitting with all 3 Strikes inflicts additional unarmed Strike damage, retains grapple, and negates falling damage to self
Guarded Movement: +4 Armor Class vs. movement reactions
Immortal Techniques: First use of a monk stance action each rd gives 20 temporary Hit Points until the start of the next turn
Impossible Technique: (R) Forces a foe reroll on a hit or gives self a reroll on a failed save
Improved Knockback: Successful Shove moves the target +5', or +10' on a critical success, and allows following; pushing into an obstacle inflicts 1d6 HP bludgeoning per 5' of prevented movement
Ironblood Stance: (1) Unarmored stance gives resistance 5 to all damage and allows iron sweep attacks
Ironblood Surge: (1) While in Ironblood Stance, gains +1 Armor Class until the start of the next turn
Knockback Strike: (2) A successful unarmed Strike allows a subsequent Athletics check to Shove
Master Of Many Styles: (F) Enters a stance at the beginning of a turn
Metal Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as cold iron and silver weapons
Mixed Maneuver: (2) Attempts 2 choices of Grapple, Reposition, Shove, and Trip at the current multiple attack penalty
Monastic Archer Stance: (1) Unarmored stance allows only bow Strikes; can use Flurry Of Blows and other unarmed monk features with bows at half their range increment
Monastic Weaponry: Has access to uncommon monk weapons/Can use monk melee weapons with unarmed attack features
Mountain Quake: (1) 20' emanation inflicts 4 HP and knocked prone (save basic Fortitude also negates knocked prone) once per 1d4 rd
Mountain Stance: (1) Unarmored stance gives +1 Armor Class (+4 - 3 due to a reduced Dex cap), +2 vs. Reposition, Shove and Trip, and -5 Speed and restricts Strikes to falling stone attacks
Mountain Stronghold: (1) While in Mountain Stance, gives +2 Armor Class until the beginning of the next turn
Mystic Strikes: Unarmed attacks count as magic weapons
One-Inch Punch: (2) Successful unarmed strike inflicts +3 damage dice, or +6 dice with 3 actions
One-Millimeter Punch: One-Inch Punch inflicts a 10' Push (save Fortitude inflicts a 5' Push; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts a 20' Push, or a 30' Push with 3 actions)
Perfected Form: Rolls of less than 10 on the first Strike each turn are treated as 10s
Pinning Fire: (R) Two successful ranged Flurry Of Blows Strikes inflict immobilized (save Reflex negates; successful DC 10 Athletics by the target or an adjacent creature ends)
Powerful Fist: Suffers no attack penalty for inflicting lethal damage with unarmed attacks
Prevailing Position: (R) Leaving the current stance gives +4 save or Armor Class vs. the triggering damage
Projectile Snatching: Successful Deflect Projectile allows an immediate ranged Strike using the deflected projectile
Reflexive Stance: (F) Enters a stance during initiative
Return Fire: Successful Deflect Projectile allows an immediate ranged Strike using the deflected arrow
Shattering Strike (Monk): (2) Unarmed Strike bypasses target resistances and ignores half of the target's Hardness
Shooting Stars Stance: (1) Stance allows using shuriken with unarmed attack features
Sleeper Hold: (1) Successful grapple also inflicts clumsy 1 until the end of the target's next turn, or unconscious for 1 min with a critical success
Stand Still: (R) Makes a melee Strike on an adjacent moving foe
Stumbling Feint: Stumbling Stance allows using a free Feint before Flurry Of Blows; success inflicts off-guard from both attacks
Stumbling Stance: (1) Stance gives +1 Deception to Feint, restricts Strikes to stumbling swing attacks, and inflicts off-guard on successful melee attackers against the next stumbling swing attack before the end of the next turn
Stunning Blows: Can inflict stunned 1 with at least 1 success on 2 Strikes from Flurry Of Blows (save Fortitude negates; critical failure inflicts stunned 3)
Swift River: (F) Ends a Speed status penalty or condition at the end of a turn
Tangled Forest Rake: (1) While in Tangled Forest Stance, a successful lashing branch Strike moves the target 10' into a space within reach
Tangled Forest Stance: (1) Unarmored stance prevents foes from moving away (save Reflex, Acrobatics, or Athletics negates) and allows lashing branch attacks
Tiger Slash: (2) While in Tiger Stance, tiger claw attack inflicts +3 damage dice and a 5' push; critical success also inflicts +4 HP persistent bleed damage
Tiger Stance: (1) Unarmored stance allows 10' Steps and tiger claw attacks
Triangle Shot: (2) While in Monastic Archer Stance, 3 bow Strikes with a -2 penalty against a single target apply Stunning Blows effects and inflict +3d6 HP persistent bleed if all 3 hit
Weapon Specialization: Inflicts +4, +6, or +8 HP damage when using a weapon with expert, master, or legendary proficiency
Whirling Blade Stance: (1) Stance allows throwing finesse monk melee weapons 10' to make multiple ranged Strikes, after which they return
Whirling Throw: (1) A successful Athletics vs. a grabbed or restrained foe's Fortitude DC allows throwing it 30', inflicting 3d6+4 HP bludgeoning, plus knocked prone on a critical success
Wild Winds Gust: (2) Makes a wind crash Strike against all creatures in a 30' cone or 60' line at the current multiple attack penalty
Winding Flow: (1) Uses 2 choices of Stand, Step, and Stride once per rd
Wolf Drag: (2) While in Wolf Stance, wolf jaw attack gains the fatal d12 trait and knocks prone
Wolf Stance: (1) Unarmored stance allows wolf jaw attacks that have the trip trait when flanking
Save: Fortitude: +34 (constitution; legendary); Reflex: +33 (dexterity; legendary); Will: +34 (wisdom; legendary)
Save Notes:
Canny Acumen (Will): Save Master (Will)
Path To Perfection (Fortitude): Save Master (Fortitude)
Path To Perfection (Reflex): Save Master (Reflex)
Path To Perfection (Will): Save Master (Will)
Peerless Form: +2 Fortitude/+2 Will
Third Path To Perfection (Fortitude): Save Legendary (Fortitude)
Third Path To Perfection (Reflex): Save Legendary (Reflex)
Third Path To Perfection (Will): Save Legendary (Will)
Bounce Back: (F) Recovery from dying does not increase the wounded condition once per day
Cobra Stance: (1) Stance gives resistance 10 to poison and +2 Fortitude saves and Fortitude DC
Dancing Leaf: Takes no falling damage when adjacent to a wall
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation fails to Coerce are critical fails
Path To Perfection (Fortitude): Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Path To Perfection (Reflex): Successes on Reflex saves are critical successes
Path To Perfection (Will): Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Third Path To Perfection (Fortitude): Critical failures on Fortitude saves are normal failures, and failed Fortitude saves inflict half damage
Third Path To Perfection (Reflex): Critical failures on Reflex saves are normal failures, and failed Reflex saves inflict half damage
Third Path To Perfection (Will): Critical failures on Will saves are normal failures, and failed Will saves inflict half damage
Magic
Focus Points: 3 Attack: Divine: +26 (wisdom; trained); Occult: +30 (wisdom; master) Spell DC: Divine: 36 (wisdom; trained); Occult: 40 (wisdom; master)
Spells:
Clinging Shadows Stance (O4 Foc): (1) Stance gives +2 Grapple checks and DC to Escape and allows shadow grasp Strikes that inflict 1d4 HP void
Embrace Nothingness (O9 Foc): (2) Self gains resistance 20 to physical damage, half speed in any direction, concealment when moving and invisibility when still, and the ability toe move through up to 2' of solid material for 1 min
Harmonize Self (O2 Foc): (1) Self regains 8 HP or attempts to counteract 1 poison or disease (heightened +1 restores +8 HP)
Inner Upheaval (O1 Foc): (1) An unarmed Strike or Flurry Of Blows gains +1 attack and +1d6 HP force, spirit, vitality, or void (heightened +4 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Medusa's Wrath (O8 Foc): (2) Unarmed Strike inflicts slowed 1, or slowed 2 on a critical success; subsequent successful or failed Fortitude reduce or increase the slowed condition by 1, or by 2 on a critical failure
Qi Blast (O3 Foc): (1) 15' cone inflicts 2d6 HP force and a 5' push (2 or 3 actions inflicts 3d6 HP in a 30' cone or 4d6 HP in a 60' cone) (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and a 10' push) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP for 1 action or +2d6 HP for 2 or 3)
Qi Form (O9 Foc): (1) Self gains a 60' fly Speed, +1d6 HP force, spirit, vitality, or force damage, a 5' aura that inflicts 2d6 HP that can be extended to 30', nonlethal weapon attacks, -2 saves vs. emotion, and +2 saves vs. other mental for 1 min
Qi Rush (O1 Foc): (1) Allows self to move twice and become concealed until the next turn
Shadow's Web (O7 Foc): (2) 30' emanation inflicts 14d4 HP void and enfeebled 2 for 1 rd (save Fortitude inflicts half HP and enfeebled 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, stunned 1, enfeebled 2 for 1 rd, and immobilized for 1 rd)
Shrink The Span (O3 Foc): (1) Teleports self 60' within line of sight
Touch Of Death (O8 Foc): (2) A successful Strike allows self to inflict stunned 3 and 80 HP on the target at any time within 1 month (save Fortitude inflicts stunned 1 and 40 HP and ends the spell; critical success ends the spell; critical failure kills the target) (heightened +1 inflicts +10 HP, or +5 HP on a successful save)
Wild Winds Stance (O4 Foc): (1) Stance gives +2 Armor Class vs. ranged attacks and allows wind crash attacks
Wind Jump (O5 Foc): (1) Self gains a 60' fly Speed, ending each turn on the ground, for 1 min (heightened 6th allows attempting a DC 30 Acrobatics check to avoid falling at the end of a turn)
Magic Notes:
Advanced Qi Spells (Qi Blast): Knows the Qi Blast occult spell
Advanced Qi Spells (Shrink The Span): Knows the Shrink The Span occult spell
Clinging Shadows Initiate: Knows the Clinging Shadows Stance occult spell
Graceful Legend: Spell Master (Occult)
Grandmaster Qi Spells (Embrace Nothingness): Knows the Embrace Nothingness occult spell
Grandmaster Qi Spells (Qi Form): Knows the Qi Form occult spell
Harmonize Self: Knows the Harmonize Self occult spell
Master Qi Spells (Medusa's Wrath): Knows the Medusa's Wrath occult spell
Master Qi Spells (Touch Of Death): Knows the Touch Of Death occult spell
Monk Expertise: Spell Expert (Occult)
Qi Spells (Inner Upheaval): Knows the Inner Upheaval occult spell/Has a focus pool
Qi Spells (Qi Rush): Knows the Qi Rush occult spell/Has a focus pool
Qi Tradition (Divine): Spell Trained (Divine)
Qi Tradition (Occult): Spell Trained (Occult)
Shadow's Web: Knows the Shadow's Web occult spell
Wild Winds Initiate: Knows the Wild Winds Stance occult spell
Wind Jump: Knows the Wind Jump occult spell
Align Qi: (R) Casting a monk spell restores 24 Hit Points once per hr
Elemental Fist: Can inflict electricity, bludgeoning, fire, slashing, or cold damage with Inner Upheaval
Lightning Qi: (F) Reduces the number of actions required to cast a subsequent qi spell by 1 once per 10 min
Meditative Focus: Refocus restores all Focus Points
Overwhelming Breath: (1) Subsequent instantaneous monk spell ignores resistance 20 to physical damage
Qi Center: (F) Casts a 1-action stance qi spell without spending a Focus Point once per min
Qi Tradition (Divine): Can learn spells from the divine tradition
Qi Tradition (Occult): Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Notes
